data.eml:eml: A review of the Canthyporus exilis group, with the description of two new species (Coleoptera: Dytiscidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bilton, David T. (2015): A review of the Canthyporus exilis group, with the description of two new species (Coleoptera: Dytiscidae). Zootaxa 3957 (4): 441-454, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3957.4.5
